entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Flurries over higher terrain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
